Member Function Documentation

HRESULT NKTWABLib::IFolders::Add ( [out, retval] Folder **   ) 

Creates a new folder.
NOTE: After creating a folder and saving it using IFolder:Save you have to restart all the objects to 'see' the new folder. This is a extrange behaviour that I wasn't able to solve.
